Mayor Trey Wilkerson

Mayor and City Council
======================

Trey Wilkerson won the November 3, 2020, General Election for the position of Mayor. He was re-elected in May 2022.  This is Mayor Wilkerson's second term to serve on the City Council.

Prior to his election as Mayor, he served as a member of the Diboll ISD School Board for 20 years, including 13 years as Board President.  He is also a past president of the Diboll Civic Club, the Diboll Booster Club, and the Diboll Rotary Club.

Mayor Wilkerson is a lifelong Dibollian and a local business owner.  His children, Annabeth and Ryan, are students at Diboll High School.

Contact:  [twilkerson@cityofdiboll.com](mailto:twilkerson@cityofdiboll.com)
